column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First time at this gem in midtown. Ordered the Tonkotsu Spicy Ramen (pork dish) and it was delicious. Comes with sprouts and spinach and spicy broth.. mannnn. My only issue is it only comes with two smedium pieces of perfectly cooked
column3: finger licking pork slices. If you REALLY want to enjoy your meal
column4: I'd recommend ordering extra meat with any of the ramen bowls bc my friends spicy chicken ramen came with the same amount. If you're a ramen eater
column5: pull up. You won't regret it. Also
column6: my wife and friend seemed to enjoy their drinks.. I'm not drinking at the moment so I can't share whether they're personally delectable or not
column7: but the ramen alone should be your reason to go. Hope this yelps!
